item.title: Ubuntu Tips
item.description: TIPS BackupYourSystem Rsync 目的在于恢复系统出现的错误，类似于虚拟机的快照。 备份 #!/bin/bash set -o errexit set -o nounset set -o pipefail readonly SOURCE_DIR=/ readonly BACKUP_DIR=/home/kurome/DataBackup readonly DATETIME="$(date '+%Y-%m-%d_%H:%M:%S')" readonly BACKUP_PATH="${BACKUP_DIR}/${DATETIME}" readonly LATEST_LINK="${BACKUP_DIR}/latest" rsync -av \ --delete "${SOURCE_DIR}/" \ --link-dest "${LATEST_LINK}" \ --exclude={"dev","proc","sys","tmp","run","mnt","media","lost+found","Trash","Downloads/*","DataBackup/*","DataPool/*"} \ "${BACKUP_PATH}" rm -rf "${LATEST_LINK}" ln -s "${BACKUP_PATH}" "${LATEST_LINK}" 注
